definition: at the minimum/at the very least

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

sentences.english: The typewriter rescued him, at least for a time.
sentences.chinese: 打字机挽救了他，起码一度挽救过他。

sentences.english: At least I needed to reach Wai Qiao village to check out that old road for crossing the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 起码走到外乔自然村看看那座山好不好爬才算。

sentences.english: What he can do afterall he is also a politician.
sentences.chinese: 他怎么能这么做，起码他还是个政治家啊。

sentences.english: High school students are boarders, at least in our school is.
sentences.chinese: 高中生都是住校的，最起码我们学校是。

sentences.english: It seemed impossible for the army to maintain any sort of order.
sentences.chinese: 看来部队要保持最起码的战斗队形都很难办到。

sentences.english: Finishing work on time is a must for a qualified assistant.
sentences.chinese: 按时完成任务，是成为一个合格的助理的起码要求。

sentences.english: I hope you do just that.
sentences.chinese: 希望你们起码能那么做。

sentences.english: Can't John at least take the trouble to write a note of thanks?
sentences.chinese: 难道约翰连写封感谢信这最起码的事也做不到？

sentences.english: I'm happier than I've ever been in my life.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴，起码在我有生之年我都有尝试过。

sentences.english: At the time of purchase to the floor, at least to moderate more.
sentences.chinese: 所以在购买地板砖时，起码要中档以上的。

sentences.english: The bottom line is that attempting to prepare CW agents is likely to have unpleasant consequences.
sentences.chinese: 试图制备化学战剂起码可能造成令人不快的后果。

sentences.english: But almost cold, saying, even so, she will at least one line up.
sentences.chinese: 顺心却冰冷的说，就算这样，起码她将朵索养大了。

sentences.english: The bottom line is Oracle is in business to make money.
sentences.chinese: 最起码的底线还是有钱可赚。

sentences.english: Where is the basic integrity in enteringinto this mercenary relationship?
sentences.chinese: 加入到这样一种雇佣关系，起码的正直到哪里去了呢？

sentences.english: The ass that brays most eats least.
sentences.chinese: 交的最响的驴吃的起码。

sentences.english: At minimum, that would unsettle Japan to the north and the Philippines to the south.
sentences.chinese: 起码，这可以令以北的日本和以南的菲律宾如坐针毡。
